name: latex
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a white liquid produced by many plants, especially rubber trees, or a rubber-like substance made from this or from plastic, used in making clothes, paint, glue, etc.: a latex mask a pair of latex surgical gloves

Add to word list
Add to word list
a white liquid produced by particular plants, esp. rubber trees, or an artificial substance similar to this, used esp. in paint, glue, and cloth: latex paint latex gloves
